scripts.build: npm run frontend:build && echo 'Build complete - full-stack Kongle Express ready!'
scripts.frontend:build: echo 'Copying frontend files...' && cp -r frontend/* backend/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.postinstall: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run frontend:build
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
